title: The Hillman GroupThe Hillman Group 35120 Pan Head Phillips Sheet Metal Screw 4 x 1/2 100-Pack
description: Sheet metal screws are designed for joining thin pieces of metal to wood, fiberglass or metal primarily through a pre - drilled or own generated hole in light gauge metal. Great for general repair around the house. Also known as tapping screws, sheet metal screws are highly versatile.
